input.sentences: on my way to work taking this long commute everyday .
this back road way should take away some of congested traffic .
this way is leading past all these abandon buildings .
coming this way sure does seems a lot less stressful .
looking out from a window at my workplace now that i have gotten here .
output.sentences: I commute to work everyday taking the bus.
I'm so glad I don't have to deal with the congested traffic on the road.
My daily commute takes me past buildings leading to the work area.
It is stressful when a lot of people are coming at the same time.
My workplace has a large window to look out of.
